nodes.text: Docking Port 12 Berth 13 was a docking bay located on the Yag-prime space station.

During the Yuuzhan Vong War, the Yuuzhan Vong launched an attack on Yag'Dhul. In thanks for their help and warning of the defense grid sabotage, Corran Horn, Anakin Solo and Tahiri Veila were given permission by Dodecian Illiet to commandeer the ship there for their escape.
